goods-1.name: apple
goods-1.description: An apple a day, keep the doctor away!!!!!!!!!!

goods-2.name: banana
goods-2.description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit - botanically a berry - produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

goods-3.name: iPhone 15
goods-3.description: The iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus are smartphones designed, developed, and marketed by Apple Inc. They are the seventeenth-generation iPhones, succeeding the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Plus.

goods-4.name: HUAWEI P60 Pro
goods-4.description: the P60 was shipped with the operating system HarmonyOS 3.1 at launch

goods-5.name: Maserati
goods-5.description: The Maserati Ghibli (Tipo M157) is an executive car produced by Italian automobile manufacturer Maserati since 2013.

goods-6.name: Porsche
goods-6.description: The Porsche 911 (pronounced Nine Eleven or in German: Neunelf) is a two-door 2+2 high performance rear-engined sports car

goods-7.name: Cola
goods-7.description: Cola is a carbonated soft drink flavored with vanilla, cinnamon, citrus oils, and other flavorings.

goods-8.name: F16
goods-8.description: The General Dynamics F-16 Fighting Falcon is an American single-engine supersonic multirole fighter aircraft

goods-9.name: tank
goods-9.description: A tank is an armoured fighting vehicle intended as a primary offensive weapon in front-line ground combat.
